#Lets plot the points
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data=coord,aes(x=x, y=y, col=Sno))+
  geom_point(size=6)+
  geom_text(size=6, aes(label=Sno))


ggplot(data=coord,aes(x=x, y=y, col=Sno))+
  geom_point(size=6)+
  geom_label(size=4, aes(label=Sno))
```



```{r}
dist_euc = dist(coord[,2:3], method = "euclidean")
round(dist_euc,0)

```


```{r}
dist_man = dist(coord[,2:3], method = "manhattan")
round(dist_man,0)
```
